auth1: This application is designed to help you better manage your daily business tasks.
auth2: This app is designed to help you better manage your trades and communicate directly with counterparties while keeping track of your productivity.
auth3: Record your business ideas, projects and calls inside the application, keep track of leads and the speed of your projects. Everything is one click away from you.
sign_up_text:
Create your profile and manage
their daily tasks with us.
Enter your number or email.
privacy_policy_text: By continuing to register you agree to the privacy policy and terms of use of the I CRM application.
login_text: Managing your daily tasks just got a whole lot easier.
secret_code_text: Verification code was sent to mobile number
